General.Name: Hurum Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Hurum Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and distributes health supplements in South Korea and internationally. The company offers lactobacillus under the TrueLAC brand name; and yogurt and biological health supplements. It also operates frozen yogurt franchise store under the Yogurberry name. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Daeryung Techno Town III, Seoul, South Korea
